title: Protecting The Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/9/19
itunes:title: Protecting The Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/9/19
description:
George Noory and technology expert William Forstchen discuss his efforts to protect the United States power grid from catastrophic failure due to a solar flare or nuclear attack by an enemy nation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
